Name: Hidden Memory - Neko's Life
About the game: Made for you to relax, get inspired and have fun! Accompany a cute stray kitten through difficult and joyful times until he finds a home! In this beautiful and relaxing minimalist puzzle, count on your memory and, through fine art, feel some moments of our kitten's life! With each puzzle solved, fantastic art will satisfy your eyes! Disconnect from the world and bring up feelings with this beautiful and inspiring game. - Steam Community Are you curious to find out more about the game? Add the game to your wishlist and follow us for news!
